description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Dog Expert Witness Allowed to Testify In Case Involving Traffic Stop
cases.description: A Dog Expert Witness could opine on the use of a police dog despite no law enforcement training.

cases.title: Real Estate Damages Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Home Appraisal Case
cases.description: A Real Estate Damages Expert Witness was allowed to testify in a foreclosure case.

cases.title: Medical Toxicology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Behavior Case
cases.description: Despite not being a medical doctor, Defendant's Medical Toxicology Expert Witness was allowed to testify on Plaintiff's erratic behavior.

cases.title: Obstetrics & Gynecology (OB/GYN) Expert Witness Not Allowed Due to Lack of Data
cases.description: Though qualified, plaintiff's Obstetrics & Gynecology (OB/GYN) Expert Witness could not testify due to lack of medical data.
